body: So....I just wanna say thanks to funky and basically every single staff member in the server,the forums look amazing now but I haven't had anytime to check out the server itself,and also,I might not be playing very often from now onwards because my grades are starting to pull down.Thats all I have to say,thanks for reading ^.^
